publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1159# Johann Lamont: Rosehill Housing Co-operative-That the Parliament notes the excellent Communities Scotland Pathfinder Inspection Report secured by Rosehill Housing Co-operative in the Glasgow Pollok parliamentary constituency; acknowledges the huge efforts of the staff and tenants at Rosehill in creating excellent socially-rented housing in the community and supporting broader community initiatives; welcomes the commitment of the Scottish Executive to the greater involvement of tenants in developing community housing plans, and believes that the Scottish Executive should consider further how it can best support the further development of fully mutual housing co-operatives.
S2M-1159# Rosehill Housing Co-operative (lodged on 8 April 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*
S2M-1159# Rosehill Housing Co-operative (lodged on 8 April 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1159# Rosehill Housing Co-operative (lodged on 8 April 2004) Scott Barrie*
S2M-1159# Rosehill Housing Co-operative (lodged on 8 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
